title: Carbon Grey Omnibus Collection
description: "LEGEND OF THE GREYS" The Sisters Grey are warriors, sworn to protect their Kaiser. But as a great war rages, the Kaiser is found dead, and one sister―Giselle Grey― is accused of his murder. Pursued by enemies, Giselle must unravel the prophecy of the Carbon Grey―before history itself unravels. This collection includes all three volumes of the epic saga, stories from CARBON ORIGINS, and a new ten-page prologue.
author: Paul Gardner
